data.title: Nas & Kelis Are At It Again!
data.meta_description: (Photo Credit: Patrick McMullan/Getty Images) It’s been years since Nas and Kelis decided to split up, but they still have some parenting to do with their 8-year-old son Knight Jones. Things don’t seem to be going to great either. According to a report from The Blast, Nas claims his ex-wife if preventing the rapper from […]
data.text:
(Photo Credit: Patrick McMullan/Getty Images)

It’s been years since Nas and Kelis decided to split up, but they still have some parenting to do with their 8-year-old son Knight Jones.

Things don’t seem to be going to great either.

According to a report from The Blast, Nas claims his ex-wife if preventing the rapper from seeing his child, and is planning to take his former wife to court in order to create a visitation schedule.

Nas wants the child on the 1st, 3rd, and 5th weekend of every month. The child will spend Mother’s Day with Kelis and Father’s Day with Nas, and they each get to celebrate their own birthday with the child.

As for the other holidays:

Kelis gets Halloween in even years, Nas gets odd.

Kelis gets July 4 in even years, Nas gets odd.

Kelis gets Summer Break in odd years, Nas gets even.

Kelis gets Thanksgiving in odd years, Nas gets even.

Kelis gets the child’s birthday in odd years, Nas gets even

The report claims that the judge is yet to decide on the matter.
